name: State appropriations for system
text: Before October 2 in every year, the board of trustees shall certify to the governor the appropriation necessary to pay to the various funds of the system the amounts payable by the State under this part for the fiscal year, beginning July 1 of the year next following, and items of appropriation providing such amounts shall be included in the general appropriation bill when it is presented to the legislature for final passage. [L 1925, c 55, pt of §8; am L Sp 1933, c 10, §3; RL 1935, pt of §7927; am L 1935, c 48, §2; RL 1945, §712, subs 6; RL 1955, §6-100; am L Sp 1959 1st, c 13, §2; HRS §88-115; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1]
